titleStmt.title: Proceedings of the French clergy against the Court of Rome, or, Acts of the assembly of my lords the archbishops and bishops that were in Paris held by the kings order in the arch-bishoprick, on Thursday the thirtieth of the month of September, 1688. S.N. / translated from the French.
titleStmt.author: Catholic Church. Assemblée générale du clergé de France (1688)

notesStmt.note: "A circulary letter from the agents general of the clergy of France ..." signed: The Abbot of Villars and the Abbot Philypeaux.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
